faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We've compiled the most frequently asked questions about our tour programs, payments, and processes.
faq.a1: Our prices include round-trip flights, accommodation in 5-star hotels, transfers in luxury vehicles, museum and historical site entrance fees, and professional guide services. Personal expenses and lunch/dinner are not included.
faq.a2: You can make your payments securely via bank transfer or credit card. Installment options are available for early reservations.
faq.a3: EU citizens do not require a visa. For TC citizens or other passport holders, we offer visa consultation services, and our team manages the entire process on your behalf.
faq.q4: What are the cancellation and refund policies?
faq.a4: Full refunds are provided for cancellations 30 days before the tour. Cancellations 15-30 days before receive 50% deduction. Unfortunately, no refunds are possible for cancellations within 15 days.
